summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Movie Recommendation app. Authentication, movie browsing, search, and recommendations are working well. Found minor UI overlay issue with button interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: Button click interception by header overlay causing timeout issues
ui_bugs.details: Header div intercepts pointer events, making search button clicks unreliable

integration_issues.issue: Clicking recommendation sometimes searches for 'Movie not found'
integration_issues.details: API returns invalid movie names in recommendations array

passed_tests: Popular Action movies loading on home page
Movie grid display with 20 movie cards
Movie card hover effects and click to modal
Searched movie display with poster and description
Click recommendations to trigger new search
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix header overlay z-index issue causing button click interception. Consider improving recommendation API data validation to prevent 'Movie not found' searches.
